altTitles.ja: ポジティブ先生 石黒正数短編集
侦探绮谭 ～石黑正数短篇
探偵綺譚 石黒正数短編集
石黑正数短篇集2：积极老师

description.en:
Volume 1 - Tantei Kitan  
- Chapter 1. Detective Lecture  
- Chapter 2. Switch  
- Chapter 3. 14 year old consultation room   
- Chapter 4. In bereaved bee …  
- Chapter 5. Karakuri (Clockwork)  
Her grandfather has passed on, leaving a mecha in his likeness to help her. Has he left other gifts and will she ever truly understand?  
- Chapter 6. Bound form of blood  
- Chapter 7. Space Ranger Go Five   
- Chapter 8. School trip   
- Chapter 9. From the bottom of a dark hole  
- Chapter 10. Tropical Pixy  
- Chapter 11. Nankoku nobunaga  
  
Volume 2 - Positive Sensei (Positive Teacher)  
- Chapter 1. Species - The 5th Beam Manga Awards Honorable Mention. Masakazu Ishiguro name.  
- Chapter 2. Justice Just   
- Chapter - Chapter 3. In the night red eyes world   
- Chapter 4. Positive teacher  
- Chapter 5. Love the screws  
- Chapter 6. Daemon Knights   
- Chapter 7. Mysterious! A transparent human comes

biography.en:
Ishiguro Masakazu (September 8, 1977 -), a Japanese male manga artist from Fukui City, Fukui Prefecture. Married.

Graduated from the Art Department of Osaka University of Art, he won the "Afternoon Four Seasons Award" for *hero* in 2000.

He claimed to be influenced by [Fujiko F. Fujio](https://mangadex.org/author/42d595b6-d361-4f55-a04d-2010950d6d66/fujiko-f-fujio), [Otomo Katsuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/42390fa3-1ff3-4ca9-871a-2133783a28a1/otomo-katsuhiro), [Ohara Shinji](https://mangadex.org/author/8db0ca1b-321e-4cb9-9f4a-7a23b5e0d9fa/ohara-shinji) and other manga artists.

In March 2009, Fuji TV's "o ni mo Kimyōna Monogatari" dramatized his short manga "Switch" into a live TV series.

In October 2010, TBS animated his serial manga "[And Yet the Town Keeps Turning](https://mangadex.org/title/1ed770ad-f028-44c4-92d3-c1aaa710e714/soredemo-machi-wa-mawatteiru?tab=chapters)" .

Ishiguro Masakazu (September 8, 1977 -), a Japanese male manga artist from Fukui City, Fukui Prefecture. Married.

Graduated from the Art Department of Osaka University of Art, he won the "Afternoon Four Seasons Award" for *hero* in 2000.

He claimed to be influenced by [Fujiko F. Fujio](https://mangadex.org/author/42d595b6-d361-4f55-a04d-2010950d6d66/fujiko-f-fujio), [Otomo Katsuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/42390fa3-1ff3-4ca9-871a-2133783a28a1/otomo-katsuhiro), [Ohara Shinji](https://mangadex.org/author/8db0ca1b-321e-4cb9-9f4a-7a23b5e0d9fa/ohara-shinji) and other manga artists.

In March 2009, Fuji TV's "o ni mo Kimyōna Monogatari" dramatized his short manga "Switch" into a live TV series.

In October 2010, TBS animated his serial manga "[And Yet the Town Keeps Turning](https://mangadex.org/title/1ed770ad-f028-44c4-92d3-c1aaa710e714/soredemo-machi-wa-mawatteiru?tab=chapters)" .
